prompt: pop, electronic, upbeat, synth, drums, catchy, female vocal, product launch, tech
lyrics:
[intro-short]

[verse]
On the landing page a tiny button waits in line
Zero on the screen but we know its counting time
Every little click becomes a story on the chart
Frontend magic turning state into a beating heart

[chorus]
Click me up, watch the numbers climb
From zero to the sky one tap at a time
Counter app shining on this glowing screen
Every little press makes the future feel clean

[outro-short]
